products.title: Azurite Chenille Teal Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille teal blue roman blind in blue/green. Made to measure from 20.63 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft green/blue oman blind fuses a plush, luxuy feel in a contemporary ocean blue tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. 
 
At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain!
 
 Product id: db-rom1141 fabric colour: teal blue material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. products.metadescription: Azurite chenille teal blue curtain in blue/green. Made to measure from 29.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft green/blue curtain fuses a plush, luxury feel in a wonderful jewelled teal tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. This ocean green shade will provide an exquisite finish within any room or space, particularly when paired with beautiful rich plum shades& dark wooden tones.All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk. 
 
We are so proud of the finish and quality, all their curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. This fabric is also available as a roman blind.
